entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:55 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
